thread.title: Video: Apple and Google apps know what you want before you do
thread.title_full: Video: Apple and Google apps know what you want before you do - MarketWatch

author: By     MarketWatch
title: Video: Apple and Google apps know what you want before you do
text:
Apple, Google: We Know What You Want Before You Do (2:14) Apple and Google are preparing new smartphone apps that will monitor and predict users’ activity and supply information before it is requested. Photo: OpenTable
More from Apple Inc. AAPL, -3.21% and Google Inc. GOOG, -0.31%
For more video news: Visit our MarketWatch Video Center .
